*   Champion an unyielding commitment to safety, strictly enforcing all EHS protocols, proactively identifying hazards, and implementing pioneering mitigation strategies, including rigorous Lock-Out/Tag-Out (LOTO) procedures and comprehensive safety inspections.
*   Ensure rigorous adherence to environmental compliance standards, actively contributing to sustainable operational practices.
*   Serve as a pivotal technical expert, providing comprehensive guidance and mentorship to colleagues while collaborating cross-functionally to achieve ambitious plant performance objectives.
*   Manage inventory and streamline procurement processes for critical components, ensuring immediate availability for all maintenance and repair initiatives.
*   Demonstrate exceptional adaptability and responsiveness to emergent operational demands, including participation in critical on-call rotations, extended work schedules, weekends, and holidays as necessitated by business imperatives.

**Qualifications & Attributes:**
*   Exceptional aptitude for sophisticated technical communication, both written and verbal, capable of articulating complex information clearly and concisely to diverse stakeholders.
*   Proven ability to seamlessly coordinate complex technical endeavors across multidisciplinary teams, fostering an environment of collaborative achievement.
*   Unwavering dedication to meeting operational demands and upholding the highest standards of safety and excellence.

This role offers an unparalleled opportunity to advance your career within a thriving industry, working with cutting-edge technology and a team of seasoned professionals. We are committed to fostering an environment of continuous learning, innovation, and significant professional development.
